params.name: id
params.description: the user's id

params.name: username
params.description: the user's username, not unique across the platform

params.name: discriminator
params.description: the user's 4-digit discord-tag

params.name: avatar
params.description: the user's [avatar hash](#DOCS_REFERENCE/image-formatting)

params.name: bot
params.description: whether the user belongs to an OAuth2 application

params.name: system
params.description: whether the user is an Official Discord System user (part of the urgent message system)

params.name: mfa_enabled
params.description: whether the user has two factor enabled on their account

params.name: banner
params.description: the user's [banner hash](#DOCS_REFERENCE/image-formatting)

params.name: accent_color
params.description: the user's banner color encoded as an integer representation of hexadecimal color code

params.name: locale
params.description: the user's chosen [language option](#DOCS_REFERENCE/locales)

params.name: verified
params.description: whether the email on this account has been verified

params.name: email
params.description: the user's email

params.name: flags
params.description: the [flags](#DOCS_RESOURCES_USER/user-object-user-flags) on a user's account

params.name: premium_type
params.description: the [type of Nitro subscription](#DOCS_RESOURCES_USER/user-object-premium-types) on a user's account

params.name: public_flags
params.description: the public [flags](#DOCS_RESOURCES_USER/user-object-user-flags) on a user's account

params.name: id
params.description: id of the connection account

params.name: name
params.description: the username of the connection account

params.name: type
params.description: the service of the connection (twitch, youtube)

params.name: revoked
params.description: whether the connection is revoked

params.name: integrations
params.description: an array of partial [server integrations](#DOCS_RESOURCES_GUILD/integration-object)

params.name: verified
params.description: whether the connection is verified

params.name: friend_sync
params.description: whether friend sync is enabled for this connection

params.name: show_activity
params.description: whether activities related to this connection will be shown in presence updates

params.name: visibility
params.description: [visibility](#DOCS_RESOURCES_USER/connection-object-visibility-types) of this connection
